com.tapsterrock.mpx
Class DefaultSettings

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.tapsterrock.mpx.MPXRecord
        |
        +--com.tapsterrock.mpx.DefaultSettings
public class DefaultSettings
extends com.tapsterrock.mpx.MPXRecord

This class represents the record in an MPX file that holds a range of default value relating to the current project plan.
